description:
The battle between the two Eight-Sixes becomes an extreme test of endurance and will for the two drivers. Will Takumi take his newly-tuned machine all the way to victory, or does Wataru have what it takes to force his rival to a halting defeat?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ACT.13 移りゆく季節のなかで
Utsuri Yuku Kisetsu no Naka de
